runs.comm: what a start for West Indies! a swinging yorker from Santokie, and the centurion from the previous game is gone for a golden duck, superb delivery from Santokie, he may not have the pace but he got this one to curl in the air, too much for Shehzad, it swung from around off towards middle, that was hitting low on middle stump, the bat came down really late, this match is swiftly unravelling for Pakistan
down the leg side this time
tries another full swinging ball, Hafeez gets bat on it, pushes it towards mid-off
the slower one from Santokie, steered towards backward point
full and outside off, defended towards mid-off, this side-arm action of Santokie has troubled batsmen this tournament
blocked off the front foot towards cover, this was again a slower one
full and wide outside off, pushed towards cover to end a superb first over for West Indies, just the single and the wicket of Shehzad
length ball on middle stump, defended off the front foot
gets well forward and blocks it back towards the bowler

Badree strikes, Bravo is dancing at extra cover after taking a simple catch, those dance moves aren't as simple though, Akmal watched two accurate deliveries from Badree, decided he had to go after the next, flat bats it to extra cover, easy for Bravo, both Pakistan openers gone for ducks
looks to slam that through the off side, bottom edge sends the ball towards midwicket, first runs off the bat
a touch more flight on this one, pushed towards cover off the front foot
again some loop after starting the over with flat one, driven to mid-on for a single, another good over for West Indies

length ball on the pads, clipped behind square leg, is there a run-out here? no, the dive saves Hafeez, he completes the second, but Pakistan get only one as Hafeez hadn't grounded his bat behind the crease when taking the first, umpire says 'one short'
wide down the leg side, off the keeper's pads, towards backward square leg, confusion among the batsmen before they decide against taking a single, there's another direct hit, Hafeez is in again
pushed towards backward point
clips this towards deep square leg for two
length ball is driven off the front foot towards mid-off
fuller and on middle stump, worked to midwicket for a single
short of length ball outside off, slapped towards backward point
defended from the crease to the off side
flat ball on off stump, pitched up, deflected towards short third
tucked towards midwicket for a single, Badree continues to be incredibly frugal
wanted to gently work the ball to the leg side, an inside -edge sends the ball onto his pad
gets back and pushes the ball back towards the bowler

the Badree googly has done it, is that the game? the big wicket of Umar Akmal, who after playing a series of dot balls, charged out for a big shot, he missed, the ball snuck between bat and pad, Ramdin collects and the stumps are flashing, Pakistan are 9 for 3 in the fourth over
Samuels starts with a wide delivery, slapped towards point, can't get it past the fielder
worked towards square leg for a single
pitched up, Malik gets forward and tucks it towards midwicket
blocked off the front foot for yet another dot ball
spins in towards off, clipped towards square leg, yet another dot ball, required rate already past 10
gets deep in the crease and flicks it in front of square leg
full ball is worked towards midwicket
a rare short ball from Badree, should have put been away, instead the batsman can't connect properly, lands short of Dwayne Smith at deep midwicket

Malik's slender fanbase is going to get thinner still as he's failed again, misses the ball outside off after coming way down the track, easy for Ramdin, Badree has his third, Pakistan are 13 for 4, that looked poor from Malik, he was backing away so far from leg, that Badree pushed it wide of off, Malik had no chance of reaching it
looking to thump it to the leg side, bottom edge and the ball bounces at his feet
guided towards backward point for another dot ball, and Pakistan have completed a Powerplay without hitting a boundary
Hafeez looking to sweep this one, but his bat gets nowhere near the ball, which is lower than Hafeez expects, struck on the pads
spinning in towards off, goes deep in the crease and steers the ball to backward point for a single
spinning in, helped towards midwicket, where a diving Sammy cuts off the chance of a single
at long last, a boundary for Pakistan, and it is a huge one, Samuels drops it short, Maqsood gets on one knee and clobbers that over midwicket, way over the rope, Afridi claps his encouragement
a touch fuller, Maqsood moves across the stumps and tucks the ball towards square leg for a single
well outside off, tapped towards deep point for a couple
Badree starts his final over, drops it short, Maqsood nearly holed out to deep point, Russell lost sight of that one, didn't attack the ball, and it lands short of him
driven towards mid-on for a single
one off stump, worked to cover off the back foot
Hafeez goes for the sweep, gets this one to spin just a little, just enough to go past off stump after Hafeez misses, slightly straighter and off stump would have been reclining
connects well this time, reaches deep square leg on the bounce
quicker one to end Badree's spell, Maqsood is down the track, dabs the ball to midwicket for a single, Badree ends with 3 for 10
starts with a superb ball, full and just outside off, dug out
full toss on the pads, should have been put away for four, short fine is in the circle, but the batsman can't guide it past the man there
Hafeez swipes this towards deep midwicket for a isngle
full ball is lashed towards extra cover, Pakistan not finding the gaps here
low full toss, driven towards long-on for a single
full ball is driven towards long-off for one more
first ball is reverse-swept to short third man for a single

Narine posing problems right away, gets the ball to bounce, not too much turn there, but the bounce is enough to beat the bat, luckily for Maqsood is backfoot remained just behind the crease, so after a couple of replays, the third umpire rules it not out
a quick carrom ball, Maqsood has no clue about that one, beaten outside off
a thick outside edge, that flies on the bounce to backward point

Maqsood really struggling against the variations of Narine, and the challenges of the mounting asking-rate, goes for the slog this time, top edge and luckily for him, lands in the vacant midwicket area
guided to third man for a single
Russell starts the over with a shortish ball outside off, Hafeez can't get bat on it as he wanted to initially scoop the ball over short fine
powerful struck down the ground, Russell takessome of the pace off the stroke, but it still gallops towards the rope, but some superb footwork near the rope stops it going for four
and now Hafeez is gone, looking for the big hit that Pakistan need with alarming regularity from now on, top edges it and that swirls to Gayle at extra cover
Maqsood having a torrid time out there, 137kph bouncer, Maqsood looking for the hook but he's way too late on that and is clonked on the helmet
a low full ball outside off, outside edge past the keeper for four, Pakistan get their second boundary off the outside edge
badly mistimed, Maqsood went after it with serious power, a short ball that was flat batted over the bowler, rolls towards long-on
West Indies on fire here, Maqsood cracked that one towards cover, a diving stop from the usually not-too-athletic Chris Gayle
blocked down the track, not too convincingly

there's the wicket, not an innings Maqsood is going to look back fondly on, he has been all at sea today, his misery ends after he skips down the track, only to miss the ball and give Ramdin another stumping, Maqsood went for a massive heave, got nowhere near the ball
spinning away well outside off, guided towards backward point
an effortless six, Tanvir hardly seemed to put any power behind the shot but he sends the ball flying over midwicket for six, the first of the innings
Narine replies wioth a ripping quick delivery  just outside off, Tanvir is flummoxed by it
Samuels starts with a short ball spinning in, guided towards point
slapped towards cover where Gayle fields
swept from outside off towards deep square leg for a single
Afridi gets going with a big six over midwicket, this was a gift from Samuels, drops it too short, Afridi capitalises

goes for the sweep, misses and there is a huge lbw appeal, turned down, Afridi wanted a leg bye though the ball had dribbled straight to backward point, a direct hit there after he was sent back and he was a goner, Santokie misses
towards mid-on for a single
backs away from the stumps and flat-bats it towards long-off
slugged towards midwicket for one more
Afridi goes for the slog, doesn't connect properly, and luckily for him, he doesn't hit it well enough to reach the long-on fielder, bounces short of Simmons
looks to sweep a ball that is way outside off
on the pads, eased towards deep midwicket for a couple
short of length ball outside off, lashes this past long-on for four
low full toss, Tanvir thumps that towards long-off, reaches Bravo on the bounce
a Dwayne Smith bouncer outside off, Afridi isn't sure how to deal with it, lets it go
another short ball, over the stumps this time, Afridi backs away and looks to dab that to third man, misses
a full toss on the pads, Afridi absolutely clobbers this one over midwicket, miles beyond the rope
and for the third time this over, Afridi doesn't get bat on ball
tries to reverse-sweep Narine, misses
there's the wicket for Narine, a quicker one from him, Tanvir plays that favourite slog of his to midwicket, ends up as a low catch there, Pakistan have lost their seventh
there's the carrom ball, past the outside edge for Gul
tucked towards midwicket for a single

full ball outside off, Afridi walked down the track, Narine fired that full and wide of off, once again a Pakistan batsman shows his hand too early, Narine sent it so wide that Afridi couldn't reach it, Ramdin gets another stumping
defended towards the off side
slower offcutter, defended down the track
length ball is driven towards long-off
short and wide outside off, Ajmal looks to thump that to the leg side, a thick bottom edge sends the ball towards mid-on
driven towards sweeper cover for a single
full ball hitting low on the base of the stumps, Pakistan are nine down, one wicket away from a proper hammering
length ball outside off, driven towards deep point
full ball from Santokie, defended towards point
there goes James the Score's prediction, a single to backward point takes Pakistan to 79
dropped, Narine has put down a skier at square leg, that was a top-edge off a sweep, Narine got under that well in time, West Indies were already beginning to celebrate, only to see Narine flub it

West Indies are through, Pakistan's record of always making the semi-finals in the World T20 is over, Pakistan have been bowled out for the same number of runs West Indies scored in their final five overs, the end comes as Gul top edges a slog to deep midwicket, West Indies are dancing in joy, waving the flag with their supporters
